name: Seth & Paige McKinney
bio: Seth and Paige founded CrossFit Aggieland in 2013 with a simple belief: great coaching changes lives. Thirteen years and 13 Best of the Brazos awards later, they still know every member by name and treat the gym like family. Seth played in the NFL for 8 seasons and holds his CrossFit Level 2 certification. Paige manages the community outreach.

name: Kori Banks
bio: Kori keeps CrossFit Aggieland running. As gym manager and coach, she handles everything from programming logistics to coaching the afternoon classes. Her attention to detail and genuine care for every athlete make her the backbone of daily operations.

name: Lauren Snider
bio: Lauren brings energy and precision to every class she coaches. She has a knack for breaking down complex movements into simple cues that click, making her a favorite among newer athletes and experienced members alike.

name: Connor Altes
bio: Connor is known for pushing athletes past what they think they can do while keeping the atmosphere fun and competitive. His programming knowledge and hands-on coaching style help members build strength and confidence fast.

name: Hanna Vanacour
bio: Hanna coaches with patience and intensity in equal measure. She meets every athlete where they are, scales workouts intelligently, and makes sure no one feels lost in class. Her warm coaching style puts first-timers at ease immediately.

name: Denim Fields
bio: Denim brings a calm, steady presence to the coaching floor. He focuses on movement quality and long-term progress, helping athletes build habits that last well beyond the gym.

name: Claire McMullin
bio: Claire combines technical coaching with genuine encouragement. She pays close attention to every rep, catches form issues early, and celebrates wins big and small. Members consistently credit her with helping them hit PRs.

name: Jared Lilly
bio: Jared brings competitive fire and deep knowledge to every session. Whether you are chasing a new back squat max or learning your first pull-up, he coaches with the same focus and intensity.
